p: Acute toxicity test of Artemisia campestris L. showed no symptoms of toxicity upon its aqueous extract administration of doses 1, 2, 4, and 6 g/kg ( Dib et al., 2017).Based on the acute toxicological studies on C. crepidioides (Benth.) S. Moore, it showed that consumption of the plant extract at a dose of 2500 mg/kg was safe. During the observation on the first 8 h, within the interval of every 8 h and upon the next 72 h, no significant change in the animal behavior or mortality was observed ( Bahar et al., 2016). It showed that the dose is safe in the in vivo testing.
